tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently had surgery at Sunrise Hospital under the care of Dr. Nikita Trehan, and I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional treatment I received. Dr. Trehan is confident and highly skilled, and she saved my kidney, essentially saving my life. She dedicated ample time to explain every detail and potential consequence of the surgery, both pre and post-operation, which provided me with great comfort and reassurance.

The staff at Sunrise Hospital were generous and courteous, making my experience as smooth as possible. Their professionalism and kindness were evident throughout my entire stay.

While the charges were higher than anticipated, the quality of care was undoubtedly worth it. Dr. Trehan’s focused and meticulous approach made all the difference. I highly recommend Dr. Nikita Trehan and Sunrise Hospital for anyone seeking top-notch medical care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have visited sunrise hospital there we met with Dr Nikita Trehan for fibroids which I am facing from last 4 years.She explained all the treatment very satisfactory.
Our surgery has been done by laparoscopically and she is very fine now.Thanks to Dr Nikita trehan and all staff of sunrise hospital..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
****** ** ********** **** ** ***** *******. Post surgical she does not even bother to meet her patients. ******* ****** **** ********** ** **** ***** **** ***** ******** ** ******** **** *** **  ******** ***** Bad thing is that she is available only on Saturday and Sunday . No dietician visit and diet chart for the patient. 
 I strongly NOT recommend this doctor.
